alert.note: Alert for Henrico (Virginia) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Wakefield (Eastern Virginia and Southern Maryland)
info.headline: Severe Weather Statement issued July 25 at 5:33PM EDT until July 25 at 6:15PM EDT by NWS Wakefield
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 615 PM EDT FOR NORTHWESTERN NEW KENT...CENTRAL HENRICO...SOUTHEASTERN HANOVER AND SOUTHWESTERN KING WILLIAM COUNTIES... At 532 PM EDT, a severe thunderstorm was located over Studley, or over Mechanicsville, moving northeast at 40 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Minor damage to vehicles is possible. Expect wind damage to trees and powerlines. This severe storm will be near... Manquin around 545 PM EDT. Other locations impacted by this severe thunderstorm include Enfield, Wrights Corner, Central Garage, Hanover Airport, Orapax Farms, Elmont, Montrose, Sandston, Longdale and Westwood. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
